author: COMSOL
description: This example computes the trajectory of relativistic protons in Earth's magnetic field. The mirror point latitude of the trapped protons is computed as a function of the equatorial pitch angle at which the protons are released. This example utilizes the Magnetic Force feature, which includes a built-in option to use the International Geomagnetic Reference Field (IGRF) data.
label: trapped_protons.mph
name: root
